page.title: 04FARMING IN HOLTON-LE-CLAY
page.content: There are{11 farms}in our area.Mainly arable but a few are mixed.The{Pine {Farm}has{259 fields.}They keep chickens and horses.{Northfield Farm has{330 hectares}of land.{Cattle {(Charolais), Shire horses, bulls}and {geese}are kept. The farmer lets the land.{Wheat, barley, rye}and{peas}are grown.{Vegetables}are grown for the {frozen food industry.}It used to be 5 farms. Now it has been joined as 1. It has been running for 21 years. On the farm is a prize bull. It weighs 1.5 tonnes.There is a smaller bull. It weighs 650 kg. The farmer went to France to purchase it. The farmer enters many agricultural shows and receives many prizes.The farm has {tractors, lorries}and{trailers.
